content: the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way 4 ws 2 section ● rs row 1 ○ k to the next sm with the main pattern and sm m1pl ○ knitting with the main pattern k2 p1 k2 p1 k2 to the next sm ○ m1pr sm ○ knit with 2k 1p pattern to the next sm sm m1pl ○ knitting with the main pattern k2 p1 k2 p1 k2 to the next sm ○ m1pr sm ○ k to the end with the main pattern ● ws row 2 knit back without any increase follow the main pattern repeat row 1 and row 2 14 15 16 17 18 19 times more with the increases take care when in your main pattern 2k 1p the following stitch is a knit stitch then you should make m1r or m1l if purl then make m1pl or m1pr do not forget the v-neck increasing in every 4 th row after the 2 section you will have 197 214 220 237 241 258 stitches on your needle tip you can count the row or make some notes in the following table rs ws rs ws 3 section you have to start the increase around a raglan stitch in row 1 you will create this raglan stitch you have to increase in every row 8 stitches in the rs and in the ws too in the increasing m1r and m1l check what stitch will be the next in the main pattern knit or purl if knit work with m1r and m1l if purl then use m1pr or m1pl ● rs row 1 ○ k to one stitch before the sm with the main pattern ○ m1r put a sm k1 this will be the raglan stitch sm m1l ○ knitting with the main pattern to the next sm ○ m1r sm k1 this will be the raglan stitch put a sm m1l ○ knit with 2k 1p pattern to 1 stitch before the sm ○ m1r put a sm k1 this will be the raglan stitch sm m1l ○ knitting with the main pattern to the next sm ○ m1r sm k1 this will be the raglan stitch put a sm m1l ○ k to the end with the main pattern ● ws row 2 ○ k to the next sm with the main pattern ○ m1r sm p1 sm m1l ○ knitting with the main pattern to the next sm ○ m1r p1 sm m1l ○ knit with 2k 1p pattern to the next sm lolbert-szabó júlia ©copyright 2024 instagram @lsz_juli this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way 5 ○ m1r sm p1 sm m1l ○ knitting with the main pattern to the next sm ○ m1r sm p1 sm m1l ○ k to the end with the main pattern ● rs row 3 ○ k to one stitch before the sm with the main pattern
